280957.「お集まりの 皆さまぁ～っ！ \n 第９回 アストルティア・ナイト コンテストに:
Ladies and gents! Allow me to introduce you
to these handsome men participating in the
9th Astoltia Knight Contest!

280958.「前大会で 好成績をおさめ \n 見事 出場権を獲得した ３名に加えて～……:
And now, joining the 3 winners from
last year's tournament...

280959.「ファルパパ神による特別推薦枠 ２名と！\n 総勢４８人の予選を勝ち抜いた ３名:
We've got 2 special recommendations from
Falpapa himself, as well as 3 winners from 48
contestants! 8 hotties will battle it out!

280960.「まずは 前大会の覇者が 堂々のご登場～！\n 主のため 時に盾となり 時に剣と:
First, we have last year's champion making a grand entrance! For the sake of his Lord, sometimes he's a shield, sometimes
a sword... The king of Farazard's excellent second in command!

280961.「あの日の誓いを果たすため\n すべてを捧げた男の 生き様を見よッ！\n 隻眼の:
Behold! The life of a man who gave up
everything to fulfill his vow that fateful
day! The one-eyed wonder... Nazine!

280962.「まさか 主を差しおいて\n 私が ナイトに 選ばれるとは……。\n 奇妙なこと:
To think, I was chosen as a Knight over my
Lord... It's strange how things
can sometimes turn out.

280963.「だが 魔族である私が ナイトとなることが\n アストルティアとの 友好につなが:
But, if my becoming a Knight as a demon leads
to friendship with Astoltia, then... I mustn't
give anything but my all.

280964.「ふたつの世界の 協調のためには\n 他でもない 君の助力が 不可欠だ。\n …:
Your help, of all people, is of the utmost
importance for the unity of our two worlds.
...I'm counting on you.

280965.「キュート！ キューティ！ キューテスト！\n 綿菓子みたいに スウィ～トな\n:
Cute! Cutie! Cutest!! Like cotton candy, this
prince is sweet, fluffy, and makes you feel
all fuzzy inside.★

280966.「民の期待を 一身に背負い\n 若き王子が 今 ナイトの座に挑む！\n メギスト:
With the expectations of his people weighing on his shoulders, the young prince now aims for the Knight's throne!
The heir to Megistris... Prince Raguas!

280967.「みなさんのおかげで 前回は\n ２位という 好成績を収めることができました。\:
Thanks to all of you, I managed to achieve a
good place last time, coming in second. But
I'm not going to stop there!

280968.「お母さん お父さん……\n そして 応援してくださった\n みなさんの想いに:
Mom, Dad... and to all of you who believed in
me, I shall repay your kindness...

280969.「今 ここに 誓いましょう！\n 正々堂々 戦い抜き\n 必ずや ナイトの座を:
I swear to you, here and now! I will fight
fair and square, and become a Knight for
sure!

280970.「続きましては みなさま お待ちかねっ！\n ウェナ諸島が誇る クールで ぶっき:
And now, ladies and gentlemen! What you've all
been waiting for! The pride of Wena Islands,
the cool, blunt, and handsome Weddie himself!

280971.「弱き者を放っておけない その姿は\n まさしく ナイトの座に ふさわしい！\n:
Not leaving the weak behind, he's a Knight in
his own right! The lone swordsman who appears
and disappears as he pleases! Hyuza!

280972.「オレみたいなのを 応援し続けてくれるなんて\n アンタらも 相当な 物好きだよ:
You guys must be crazy to keep supporting a
guy like me...

280973.「誰かのために 戦うなんて\n 正直 オレのガラじゃあないが……\n アンタらの:
Fighting for others is really not my thing,
but... it's not so bad if it's for you guys.

280974.「その期待に 全力で応えなきゃな。\n 最高の勝利を プレゼントしてやるよ。:
Guess I'll have to live up to your
expectations. I'll win for you, my treat.

280975.「続いて ファルパパちゃんによる\n 特別推薦枠 ２名を ご紹介だよぉーっ！:
Next, I'd like to introduce the two specially
recommended by Falpapa!

280976.「ガートラント王国を建国した 伝説の王！\n その 鍛え抜かれた マッシヴな肉体:
The legendary king and founder of Gartlant!
A superb fellow who can take anything on with
his massive, well-trained body!

280977.「背中で語る 漢道～！\n 不器用な男の しぶすぎる魅力を ご堪能あれ！\n 傷:
A man of few words with a fierce aura!
He's clumsy, and has a bitter charm about him!
The Mighty Guy covered in scars, Lada Gart!

280978.「ぬ……？\n 何やら 妙な戦いに\n 巻き込まれてしまったようだ。:
Hm...? I seem to have gotten involved
in some kind of strange battle.

280979.「ナイトの座とやらに 興味はないが……\n 見れば 競い合う敵手は 年若い者ばか:
I have no interest in being a Knight, but...
looking around, all of my opponents are so
young.

280980.「オーグリードの闘神と うたわれた\n このラダ・ガートが 相手になってやろう！:
I, Lada Gart, sung as Ogreed's god of war,
shall be your opponent! Now, let's get on with
it... it's time to battle!

280981.「６０００年前 世界を覆った災厄に\n たったひとりで 立ち向かった\n アスト:
Here comes the mightiest swordsman in all of
Astoltia, who alone stood against the calamity
that swept the world 6000 years ago!

280982.「麗しの イケメンエルフが\n ホワイトショコラ城に 旋風を巻き起こす！\n 二:
This handsome, beautiful elf will surely
cause quite the storm here at the Castle!
The second Time Sovereign, Hakuo!

280983.「このナイト コンテスト……。\n アストルティアの頂点を 決する戦いだと\n:
This contest of Knights... Merrill had told me
this is a battle to determine Astoltia's
absolute best.

280984.「私が 誇れるものなど\n 剣のウデくらいしか ありません。\n どこまで 戦え:
My only pride is that of my skill with a
sword. I don't know how far I can go in
this battle...

280985.「ここで 無様に果てるようでは\n 時の王者の 名折れというもの。\n ……本気:
If I fail here, however, I'll have failed as
Time Sovereign. It's time to get serious!

280986.「じゃじゃーん！\n 第９回 アストルティア・ナイト コンテストの\n 結果発表:
Ta-daaa! I'll be soon announcing the results
of the 9th Astoltia Knight Contest!

280987.「さあさあ！ ホワイトショコラ城の\n ナイトの座は 誰の手に！？\n 耳の穴か:
Come, now! Who will be the Knight of the
White Chocolate Castle? Clear your ears and
listen well!

280988.「いっくよ～！\n みんなっ ステージに 注目するべし～っ！！: Here we go! Everyone, please watch the stage!

283463.「ここからは 激しい予選を勝ち抜いた\n 強豪が 続々 登場～！\n まずは！:
From here on out, our strong competitors who
won the qualifying rounds will come out one
after the other! First up, our top qualifier!

283464.「夜に閉ざされた 迷宮に挑みし 黒衣の冒険者！\n ゴーグルの奥で光る 鋭い視線:
The adventurer in black who braves the maze
hidden by night! His keen eyes behind those
goggles leave no treasure undiscovered!

283465.「甘いマスクと オトナの立ち回りで\n あなたのハートを 華麗に いただきっ！\:
With his sweet mask and mature demeanor, he
will no doubt win your heart! The Smart
Seeker, Raul!

283466.「また この舞台に立てるとは 光栄だな。\n キミたちとの 再会を果たせて\n:
I am honored to be here on this stage again.
It's great to see you all.

283467.「この先の未来に 何が 待ち受けていようと\n 前を向いて 進んでいけば\n い:
No matter what lies ahead, if you keep pushing
forward, you'll one day fulfill your goals.

283468.「ナイトの座も 月のごとく輝く財宝も\n 必ず この手に 取りもどす！\n どう:
I'll take back the Knight's throne, just like
a treasure that shines in the moonlight!
Please, lend me your strength.

283469.「その忠誠心は 時をも超える……。\n 古代エテーネ王国から やってきた\n い:
Their loyalty transcends time itself... the
powerful squire from the ancient Kingdom of
Ethene will always give his all!

283470.「ぶちかませっ 勝利のギガスラッシュ！\n 真心あふるる剣豪～っ ファラス！:
Hit 'em with a Gigaslash! The Swordsman of
Sincerity, Faras!

283471.「ほほう！ アストルティアを 代表する\n 強者たちが 一堂に 会するとは……！:
Hoho! What a great opportunity to see
Astoltia's strongest all in one place! Quite
the spectacle, huh?

283472.「敵が強ければ強いほど 燃え上がるもの。\n 誰が 相手だろうと 狙うは頂点のみ:
The stronger the enemy, the more fired up you
are! No matter your opponent, you should
always aim for the top!

283473.「見ていてください 我が主！\n このファラス……必ずや エテーネ王国に\n 栄:
Watch me, my Lord! I, Faras, will surely bring
the crown to the Ethene Kingdom!

283474.「ラストの 出場者は……って\n あーーーっ！ いつの間に あんなとこに！？:
And our final contestant is... Aaaahh!
How did you get in here?!

283475.「主君を差しおいて 王座を奪うとは\n まったく 大した 幼なじみ殿だ。:
It seems you've taken the throne over your
Lord, my dear childhood friend.

283476.「主役は 遅れてやってくる！\n 戦乱の魔界を 駆け抜ける\n 自由で型破りな:
The star of the show arrives late! The free,
yet unconventional, Demon King of the City of
Sand!

283477.「その胸に燃える 炎の意志で\n 今こそ ナイトの座を つかみとれ！\n 果敢な:
With a willful flame burning in his heart, he
comes to claim the throne! The Demon World's
bold soldier of fortune, Yushka!

283478.「俺がいない間に ずいぶんと\n 面白いことに なっているようだな。\n 俺も:
Seems like things have gotten pretty
interesting while I've been gone. I'd like
to partake in the festivities.

283479.「真に 頂点にふさわしいのは 誰か……\n 今 ここで 決着をつけるとしよう。:
Who really deserves to be at the top...?
Let's settle this, here and now.

283480.「ナイトの座は ファラザードの魔王\n このユシュカが もらい受ける！:
The Knight's throne will be taken by me, the
Demon King of Farazard, Yushka!

283482.「以上っ！ ８名のイケメンが\n ナイトの座をかけ コンテストを争っちゃうよ！:
And that's it! These eight handsome men will
compete for the title of Knight!

283483.「栄光の座に かがやくのは 誰か……\n それを決めるのは！\n こ・こ・に・い:
Who will be crowned with glory...? It's up to
you to decide! All! Of! You!

283484.「さ～て どう？ どう？ <pc>。 \n ちょーイケメンが 大集合だけど\n:
Well? Well? There are so many gorgeous men
here, but which one is your honest favorite?

283485.「アストルティア・ナイトに ふさわしいと思う \n イケメンを選んだら\n キミ:
When you've made your choice of who you think
is worthy, make sure to cast your vote!

283486.「投票は 私の カワイイ妹っ！\n 集計係モカの所で 受け付けてるからね！: Give your votes to my cute sister, Mocha!

283487.「ナイトに 投票し終わったら\n 話すことがあるから メリルの所に 来るべし！\:
After you've chosen your votes, come see me!
I'll be waiting for you outside, I promise!
